item.description:
Wir feiern mit einem traditionellen German New Year's thing- a dramatic reading of "Dinner for One!"
Our schedule changed this month due to the Silvester holiday, so instead of 1st and 3rd we are meeting on the 2nd and 4th Thursdays. There are usually many more people than the RSVP shows. Normally, 12-15 people show up.
This will be our first meeting with a new US President! We can talk a little about this history-making day. Come and speak German with us! Welcome to our newest members!
item.how_to_find_us: We meet in the back room of Panera.
item.name: West Hartford German Kaffeeklatsch DRAMA
